list_definition.definition: to put in a straight line or in parallel lines

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Align the two pieces of wood before joining them together.

list_definition.definition: to attach (oneself) to one side in an argument, politics etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He aligned himself with the rebels.
